meanings.definition: Having a color between black and white
meanings.sent1: The sky looked grayer as the storm approached.

meanings.sent3: The grayer clouds seemed to be crying raindrops.
meanings.sent4: The grayer shadows of dusk crept across the field.
meanings.sent5: The grayer cat blended perfectly with the pavement.
